The nights are terrible, the club music is very strong, the decibel level drops only after 3 a.m. and completely ceases at 5-6 a.m. There is no staff at the reception, no English is spoken at all, it is very difficult to get acquainted with the people there. Cute small hotel where you feel in harmony. Marvelous sea view from the room. Tasty breakfasts, although it might be not convenient to sit in small crowded room waiting for your meal. Really hospitable staff. Delicious food in the restaurant.

Stunning villa with amazing inner yard,  stone-thrown to Uzhgorod castle. Cosy atmosphere and high quality renovated design. Very friendly and helpful staff.

This hotel has an excellent location close to the Rynok (Market) Square in Old Town and relatively close to the railway station. The staff is friendly and cheerful, my room was clean. They ask you to choose one of the options from breakfast menu.
